ashenwitchbroom.configuration.title: Ashen Witch Broom Configs
ashenwitchbroom.configuration.items.tool: List of items for testing purposes
ashenwitchbroom.configuration.logDirtBlo: Whether to log dirt block information
ashenwitchbroom.configuration.magicNumbe:
Magic number value for testing
Don't understand the range of values? 
No problem, just know that it's very big!
ashenwitchbroom.configuration.baseSpeedP:
Base flight speed percentage of the broom
Don't understand the range of values? 
No problem, just know that it's very big!
ashenwitchbroom.configuration.speedBoost: Speed boost multiplier when Ctrl key is pressed
ashenwitchbroom.configuration.advancedMo: Auto switch to third person view when riding broom
Select the flight mode of the broom
NORMAL: Normal mode - Standard flight experience
SPORT: Sport mode - Really very floating
ashenwitchbroom.configuration.summonSear:
Set the search range (in blocks) when summoning brooms
The system will prioritize searching for broom entities within this range
Larger range provides more comprehensive search but may affect performance
ashenwitchbroom.configuration.enableGlob:
Whether to enable global broom summoning
Enabled: If no broom is found nearby, search the entire world
Disabled: Only search within the set range
ashenwitchbroom.configuration.enableCros: When enabled, allows summoning brooms from other dimensions (such as Nether, End) to the current dimension
ashenwitchbroom.configuration.enableDeta:
When enabled, displays detailed statistics of summonable brooms after summoning
Includes: total count, inventory count, nearby count, current world count, all dimensions count
message.ashenwitchbroom.no_broom_availab: No broom available! Please get a broom first.
message.ashenwitchbroom.already_riding: You are already riding a broom!
message.ashenwitchbroom.broom_data_misma: Broom data mismatch, automatically cleaned up!
command.ashenwitchbroom.broom.help.title: §6=== Broom Commands Help ===
command.ashenwitchbroom.broom.help.detec: §e/broom detect [player]§r - Display all stored broom information
command.ashenwitchbroom.broom.help.stats: §e/broom stats [player]§r - Show broom statistics (same as R key)
command.ashenwitchbroom.broom.help.clean: §e/broom cleanup [player]§r - Clean up invalid broom records
command.ashenwitchbroom.broom.help.note: §7Note: Commands without [player] parameter apply to command executor
command.ashenwitchbroom.broom.error.no_p: §cYou don't have permission to use this command
